content:
11. the problem in our locations page is still exist and we have report it multiple times and I think there is misunderstand in it 
if you review the previous mails you will find that we asked to make it like website if you open this page in mobile you will find every store have it’s name and info that come from the store locator plugin you will see in the screenshot below so please fix it and hide the open time 
screenshot for what we need : https://drive.google.com/file/d/1m0IMDHougJJrFA6O9uvVUGoDUFEZk6lC/view?usp=share\_link
and of course Arabic in Arabic and English in english

answer
We resyticted in design and development to agreed scope which is develop location page like the one in extra app
